channel.title: How do i make npc say when server owner is online or offline?
channel.description: title says it all i just want an npc in ::home that says when im online and when my co-owner is online thanks!

item.title: How do i make npc say when server owner is online or offline?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

else if (npcs[i].npcType == 1091) { if (misc.random2(10) <= 3) //this is the time delay { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("Chassy")) { npcs[i].textUpdate = "Chassy is ONLINE"; } else { npcs[i].textUpdate = "Chassy is OFFLINE"; } } }
